DESCRIPTION: The Dragon builds #yEmbers in her chest, then consumes them in order to increase the power of her #yBreath #yAttacks.
This card has a #ySpark and #yBreath form. Whenever you have 5 or more #yEmbers this card transforms into its #yBreath form.
This card has a #ySpark and #yBreath form. Whenever you have less than 5 #yEmbers this card transforms into its #ySpark form.
When a card generates a #yGem, it will randomly generate one of many possible #yGems. #yGems have various small effects. #yGems #yExhaust.
A #yNest is a power that grants bonus effects at the start of the next turn based on unspent #yEnergy.
